Thinking that this is the perfect moment in which to give Helena the gift you'd bought for her, you present her with both the box of chocolates as well as a flattering comment on her appearance.

#IF(!helena.isSlutty()) Blushing a little at the sudden gesture, the beautiful matriarch elegantly takes the gift you're offering her, before softly commenting, [helena.speech(How kind of you, [pc.name]. I shall surely enjoy these later.)] #ELSE Biting her lip and flashing you an excited glance, the beautiful matriarch elegantly takes the gift you're offering her, before suggestively commenting, [helena.speech(Perhaps we can enjoy these together later in my bedroom...)] #ENDIF

Thinking that this is the perfect moment in which to give Helena the gift you'd bought for her, you present her with both the bottle of perfume as well as a flattering comment on her appearance.

#IF(!helena.isSlutty()) Blushing a little at the sudden gesture, the beautiful matriarch elegantly takes the gift you're offering her, before softly commenting, [helena.speech(How kind of you, [pc.name]. I shall happily add this to my collection.)] #ELSE Biting her lip and flashing you an excited glance, the beautiful matriarch elegantly takes the gift you're offering her, before suggestively commenting, [helena.speech(I'll make sure to put this on for our next date...)] #ENDIF

Thinking that this is the perfect moment in which to give Helena the gift you'd bought for her, you present her with both the perfect rose as well as a flattering comment on her appearance.

#IF(!helena.isSlutty()) Blushing a little at the sudden gesture, the beautiful matriarch elegantly takes the flower which you're offering her, before softly commenting, [helena.speech(How kind of you, [pc.name]. I shall put this in a vase in my apartment.)] #ELSE Biting her lip and flashing you an excited glance, the beautiful matriarch elegantly takes the flower which you're offering her, before suggestively commenting, [helena.speech(I'll put this in my bedroom when we get there later tonight...)] #ENDIF

Thinking that this is the perfect moment in which to give Helena the gift you'd bought for her, you present her with both the bouquet of roses as well as a flattering comment on her appearance.

#IF(!helena.isSlutty()) Blushing a little at the sudden gesture, the beautiful matriarch elegantly takes the flowers which you're offering her, before softly commenting, [helena.speech(How kind of you, [pc.name]. I shall put these in a vase in my apartment.)] #ELSE Biting her lip and flashing you an excited glance, the beautiful matriarch elegantly takes the flowers which you're offering her, before suggestively commenting, [helena.speech(I'll put these in my bedroom when we get there later tonight...)] #ENDIF

Thinking that this is the perfect moment in which to give Helena the gift you'd bought for her, you present her with the teddy bear as well as a flattering comment on her appearance.

Frowning a little at what it is you're giving her, the beautiful matriarch sharply comments, [helena.speech(This really isn't my sort of thing, [pc.name]. I appreciate the gesture, but please do not offer me something like this again.)]
